title: The Ambushers
description: oI interrogated her. She was soft, like all you Nazis. Soft and yellow inside. Like butter.OCO After carrying out a deadly assignment for a foreign nation, Matt Helm can unwind by tracking down a Nazi who doesnOCOt know the war is over, and who has plans for a Russian missile smuggled out of Cuba, plans that donOCOt look good for the United States. His only ally is a battle-scarred and shapely female Soviet agent who canOCOt stand to be touched. At first, anyway. PRAISE FOR DONALD HAMILTON oAn all new tale and a very exciting one.OCO PUBLISHERS WEEKLY oHamiltonOCOs pace is exemplary and his capacity to divert spectacular.OCO NEW YORK HERALD TRIBUNE oMatt Helm is as credible a man of violence as has ever figured in the fiction of intrigue.OCO NEW YORK SUNDAY TIMES"
author: Donald Hamilton
